channel.title: StackStorm - scenes behind workflow execution
channel.description:
how the multi-threading is implemented in StackStorm workflow executions.
Currently, we are seeing a behavior where the execution times of workflows keep exponentially increasing with concurrent executions.
If you can throw some insights on how the actions/workflows are dealt or configured in multi-threaded or parallel executions, we can then test a few configuration changes to improve the execution times.![workflows%20execution|690x138](upload://snRzHP9L0UC8zVrPfcm5pzSHhUM.png)

how the multi-threading is implemented in StackStorm workflow executions.

Currently, we are seeing a behavior where the execution times of workflows keep exponentially increasing with concurrent executions.

If you can throw some insights on how the actions/workflows are dealt or configured in multi-threaded or parallel executions, we can then test a few configuration changes to improve the execution times.
